root: ^ME: I know. Definitely from the State.
^ALYSSA: The only thing missing are a thousand State flags. They usually love doing that.
^ALYSSA: In any case, the door looks reinforced, so there is no way we'll be able to get in ourselves. Better report back to base.
^ALYSSA: I've fixed my car in the meantime so I'll just meet you out there.
